name: Syrious Scramble Full
description:
If you like word games, you'll love Syrious Scramble®! Make as many 3 to 6 letter words as possible from 6 scrambled letters before time runs out! If you're fast, time bonuses give you even more points. Find one of the longest words or get 7,500 points in a round and you go on to the next round.

You'll find plenty of variation. It uses a set of over 28,000 3 to 6 letter words to produce over 8,000 different puzzles. Each puzzle has between 10 and 72 words for you to find. You can also look up definitions of words you miss to expand your vocabulary.

This Full version has over 8,000 puzzles, an Untimed mode, and you can send your score to the Global High Scores to compete with your friends or players world-wide! You can try out the FREE version first at no cost.

It costs less than a cup of coffee and will give you endless hours of addicting entertainment!

Optimized for phones, tablets, and Google TV.

Brought to you by Syrious Games®
